thread.title: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4
thread.title_full: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4

title: Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4
text:
> Pennsylvania Marte's homer in 12th inning lifts Pirates over Reds 6-4 Cincinnati Reds' Tyler Holt, bottom, dives for second on a steal as Pittsburgh Pirates shortstop Jordy Mercer hops over him as he tries to catch the throw from catcher Francisco Cervelli in the fourth inning of a baseball game, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Pittsburgh. Holt went to third on the throw. (AP Photo/Keith Srakocic)
